title: Lesson 12
paragraph: Law and governance require guidance, fairness, and enforcement. Judges and officials examine schemes, guarantee compliance, and manage federalized regulations to protect society.

words.example: The teacher guided the students through the experiment.
The island harbors many rare species.

words.meaning: a person authorized to decide legal cases
words.example: The judge ruled in favor of the plaintiff.

words.meaning: an overflow of water covering land

words.example: The company launched a new marketing scheme.
The doctor examined the patient thoroughly.

words.meaning: to bring under federal control or authority
words.example: The policy aims to federalize certain education standards.

words.meaning: to take a brief or quick look
words.japaneseMeaning: 一見する、ちらりと見る
words.example: He glanced at the report before the meeting.

words.meaning: to promise or ensure something will happen
words.example: The warranty guarantees repairs for two years.
